H0.text: Made in Cornwall, Yarg cheese is wrapped in what. Seaweed

H1.text: Made in Cornwall, Yarg cheese is wrapped in what. Ferns

H2.text: Made in Cornwall, Yarg cheese is wrapped in what. Wild Garlic

H3.text: Made in Cornwall, Yarg cheese is wrapped in what. NETTLES

A4.text: Nettles are sometimes used in cheesemaking, such as for Cornish Yarg.
